scripts.build:test: pip install coverage && env-cmd -f ../../dotenv/.env.test-ui python ./web/manage.py runserver --settings=web.settings.test-ui.settings 127.0.0.1:3002
scripts.test:all: coverage erase && yarn test:unit && yarn test-ui
scripts.test:unit: yarn test-routes && yarn test-models && yarn test-api && yarn test-helpers && yarn test-dbmodels
scripts.test-routes: env-cmd -f ../../dotenv/.env.test-ui coverage run ./web/manage.py test web api --settings=web.settings.test-ui.settings
scripts.test-helpers: env-cmd -f ../../dotenv/.env.test-ui coverage run -m unittest discover -s tests.test_helpers -p test_*.py
scripts.test-api: env-cmd -f ../../dotenv/.env.test-ui coverage run -m unittest discover -s ./tests/api_test -p apitest_*.py
